articles.title: US Secretary of State says Russia could invade Ukraine during Olympics - 9News
articles.description: Russia could invade Ukraine during the current Beijing Winter Olympics so Americans should leave the Eastern European country immediately, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said following the Quad meeting in Melbourne

articles.title: EU unveils €150bn investment plan for Africa - Punch Newspapers
